snippet: The yoga wear retailer said on Friday that Dennis J. Wilson, its founder and former chief executive, would leave his remaining executive role as chief innovation and branding officer.
abstract: Yoga wear retailer Lululemon Athletica says Dennis J Wilson, its founder and former chief executive, will leave his remaining executive role as chief innovation and branding officer.
lead_paragraph: The yoga wear retailer said on Friday that Dennis J. Wilson, its founder and former chief executive, would leave his remaining executive role as chief innovation and branding officer.

headline.seo: Lululemon Athletica’s Founder Takes a Step Back
headline.main: Lululemon Athletica’s Founder Takes a Step Back
headline.print_headline: Lululemon Athletica’s Founder Takes a Step Back
